QuestData.Title: Hue
QuestData.Description: The most distinguishing feature of the Dream Brew is its iridescent, dream-like color.$B$BTo the east, you will find Glittering Amberflies. I will need their wings to create the final luminescent color of the brew.$B$BTake this knife and use it to collect 8 wings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected all the ingredients? It is almost time to make the Dream Brew.
QuestData.RewardText: Beautiful color, rare transparency, shimmer but not sparkle...these will do quite well.$B$BI am beginning to see great potential in you, strange one.
